title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: EFL Teaching Methodology for Vietnamese-English Using AI Translation Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three limitations of AI translation tools in Vietnamese-to-English translation and analyze cultural error cases.
Learners can design a three-step process to critically evaluate AI-translated results, referencing career-stage teaching strategies (early/mid/late).
Learners can develop translation quality assessment criteria in three core areas—family titles, idiomatic expressions, and rhetorical structures—and apply them to project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
